items.title: Crappie, Sunfish, Hunting Birds?
items.summary: I go back to an old spot on Lake Holcomb, using Berkley Gulp Minnows and Nightcrawlers. I get to see a Crane out on it's morning hunt for breakfast! Bait Used: Berkley Gulp Minnows, Nightcrawlers Be Sure to SUBSCRIBE for New Videos Every Week…
items.content_html:
I go back to an old spot on Lake Holcomb, using Berkley Gulp Minnows and Nightcrawlers. I get to see a Crane out on it's morning hunt for breakfast!

Bait Used: Berkley Gulp Minnows, Nightcrawlers

items.title: New Spot Full of Fish??
items.summary: We try out a new spot, Spring Trails Lake, that we found on Fishbrain (no affiliation with Fishbrain, I just like the app) which had a ton of catches logged. We tried nightcrawlers, chicken livers, strawberry garlic hot dogs, cherry jello bacon and lures…
items.content_html:
We try out a new spot, Spring Trails Lake, that we found on Fishbrain (no affiliation with Fishbrain, I just like the app) which had a ton of catches logged. We tried nightcrawlers, chicken livers, strawberry garlic hot dogs, cherry jello bacon and lures to try to see if we can find the same fish as we've seen logged.

Be Sure to SUBSCRIBE for New Videos Every Week - http://bit.ly/2LVRobp

items.title: New Year's Day Catfish with my Daughter
items.summary: Maddie and I go to Lake Woodlands and Lake Holcombe to catch some big channel catfish! The baits we caught them on?? Chicken Liver and Strawberry Jello Garlic Hotdogs! Be Sure to SUBSCRIBE for New Videos Every Week - http://bit.ly/2LVRobp Follow me on Social Media:…
items.content_html:
Maddie and I go to Lake Woodlands and Lake Holcombe to catch some big channel catfish!

The baits we caught them on?? Chicken Liver and Strawberry Jello Garlic Hotdogs!
